an10.89:15.3: The measure here is the _khārika_. A fully laden cart with a single horse can draw around 500 kg. Divide by 20 makes 25 kg, which is roughly a bushel. Since a single sesamum weighs 0.00364 grams, this yields a period of about 15 billion years. The current estimate of the age of the universe in physics is estimated at 13.7 billion years.
